content: introducing sparkle a beacon of magic in the world of amigurumi standing at an impressive **20 inches** this enchanting crochet unicorn is as much a work of art as it is a cuddly companion crafted with vibrant bulky weight yarn her radiant colors are sure to brighten both rooms and moods what sets sparkle apart is her unique ability to proudly stand on all four legs making her not just a playmate but also a statement piece her mane and tail are a cascade of delightful curls adding a whimsical touch and a hint of realism to her design beyond her aesthetic allure sparkle s plush size makes her the ultimate snuggle buddy perfect for those heartfelt hugs by both the young and the young-at-heart whether you re searching for that special gift or simply looking to add a touch of magic to your own collection sparkle the unicorn promises to sprinkle enchantment wherever she goes dive into a fantastical world where crochet meets imagination and let sparkle be your guide full video tutorial available on the marly bird youtube channel 1 ✨ this is a free pattern on the website ✨ the ad-free pdf of the pattern is available here https //shop marlybird com/products/sparkle-crochet-unicorn-amigurumi 2 ##
